overview: A Flutter application using Stacked architecture that implements a counter functionality with a custom increment value of 1009.
key_events: Counter increment behavior modified from +1 to +1009
Unit and integration tests updated for new increment value
system_responses: Modified HomeViewModel increment logic to add 1009 instead of 1
Updated test suite to verify new increment behavior
Added documentation for modified counter functionality
current_state: The application maintains its original architecture while featuring a modified counter that increments by 1009 instead of 1. All tests and documentation have been updated to reflect this change.
